additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Alkyl Ester Ammonium, Cetostearyl Alcohol, Fragrance, Calcium Chloride, Ethanol, 1-Hydroxy Ethylidene-1 Diphosphonic Acid, 1,2-Benzisothiazol-3(2H)-One, Dimethicone, Colourants.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Caution: Keep Out Of Reach Of Children. Fabric Conditioners Are Not For Use On Children'S Sleepwear Or Other Garments Labelled As Flame Resistant As They May Reduce The Flame Resistance. If Swallowed: Drink Plenty Of Water And Seek Medical Advice Or Contact A Poison Information Centre On Aus 131 126, Nz 0800 764 766. Contact With Eyes: Flush With Water For At Least 15 Minutes And Seek Medical Advice. Safety directions: Keep out of the reach of children.
